item_shield_desc: Avoids penalty when failing an answer
item_theme_underwater_desc: Visual theme with fish and coral
item_theme_forest_desc: Visual theme with trees and nature
item_theme_desert_desc: Visual theme with sand and palm trees
item_theme_arctic_desc: Visual theme with ice and snow
help_how_to_play_desc: MathAdventure is an educational math game where you must solve math operations against time. Earn coins and level up while learning!
help_visual_mode_desc: In this mode you'll see visual representations with tens blocks (ğŸ“¦x10) and units (ğŸ) to make counting easier. Ideal for beginner levels.
help_unknown_mode_desc: You must find the missing number in the operation. For example: "? Ã— 5 = 20". This mode develops inverse thinking.
help_standard_mode_desc: Classic math operations where you calculate the result. For example: "7 + 3 = ?"
help_op_addition: â• Addition: Addition operations for all levels
help_levels_desc: You start at Level 1 and level up automatically every time you earn 50 coins. As you level up:
help_coins_desc: ğŸ’° Coins: You earn 10 coins for each correct answer. Coins accumulate in your profile and help you appear in the Hall of Fame.
help_players_step1: Type the player's name in the text field
help_players_step3: The new player will appear in the list with Level 1 and 0 coins
help_players_step4: Click on a player to configure their operations and play
help_duel_desc: The Duel Mode allows multiple players to compete against each other:
help_duel_turns: Each player plays a 30-second turn at their current level
help_duel_score: Coins earned in the duel are NOT added to the profile
help_duel_winner: At the end, the player who earned the most coins during the duel is shown
help_duel_start: To start a duel, simply click the "ğŸ† DUEL MODE" button from the main screen.
help_store_desc: In the Store you can spend the coins you earn playing to buy useful items and visual themes:
help_store_potion: â° Time Potion (50 coins): During the game, use the â° button to add +15 seconds to the timer
help_store_freeze: â„ï¸ Time Freezer (50 coins): During the game, use the â„ï¸ button to freeze time for 5 seconds
help_store_shield: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Protective Shield (100 coins): Prevents you from losing time when failing an answer. Use the ğŸ›¡ï¸ button in game
help_store_theme_space: ğŸŒŸ Space Theme (200 coins): Changes the game background with a stars and space theme
help_store_theme_jungle: ğŸŒ Jungle Theme (200 coins): Changes the game background with a jungle and bananas theme
help_store_access: To access the store, click the "ğŸª STORE" button from a player's settings screen.
help_store_consumables: ğŸ’¡ Important: Potions and shields are consumables. After using them in a game, they're spent and you'll need to buy more. Visual themes are permanent.
help_tip1: â±ï¸ Each correct answer adds 2 seconds to the timer
help_tip2: âŒ An incorrect answer subtracts 4 seconds
help_tip3: ğŸ¯ Practice with one operation at a time if you're just starting
help_tip4: ğŸ… Appear in the Hall of Fame by being one of the top 3 players
config_problem_bags_hint: Select the types of problems you want to solve
no_problems_selected: âš ï¸ Select at least one problem bag to play
achievements_collector_description: Unlock all visual themes from the store
achievements_no_fooling_me_description: Solve 5 logic problems in a row without failing
achievements_lateral_thinker_description: Solve your first Advanced Level problem
achievements_lynx_eye_description: Correctly answer a logic problem in less than 10 seconds
achievements_fire_streak_description: Get 10 operations in a row without errors
achievements_immortal_description: Use a Protective Shield on a streak of more than 20 correct answers
achievements_light_speed_description: Solve a hard level operation in less than 3 seconds
achievements_zero_fails_description: Finish a session of 20 questions with 100% accuracy
achievements_calculator_human_descriptio: Achieve a streak of 50 consecutive correct answers
achievements_vip_customer_description: Buy your first item from the store
achievements_war_ready_description: Have at least 5 potions and 5 shields in inventory at the same time
achievements_connected_description: Connect for the first time with another device
achievements_pythagoras_chosen_descripti: Play on a Monday at 8:00 AM
